author: jeongeun
body:
Updating the standard RECO and AOD EventContent definitions
to remove wildcard _Digis.
'keep ZDCDataFramesSorted__Digis____', --> 'keep ZDCDataFramesSorted_hcalDigis____',
and to remove some lines.(no such Module in EventContent)
title: Update RecoLocalCalo_EventContent_cff.py
